reviews.text: Trains are delayed at all times - announcements are weird - e.g. trains are delayed due to slippery rails... staff usually is ok however I experienced a very rude one too at this station.

Couldn't travel today no one was at the desk, it was closed, you cant buy 2 week off peak pass from the machine's, so I had to fork out extra money, I rang customer service guy sounded like a nice enough bloke ,I ask him the reason for it being closed, he said "staff shortage" well done london Midland. Absolutely useless,I feel empathetic towards the disabled passengers when they have to put up with this

Very busy and popular station. Platforms and  Toilets are clean. Plenty of ticket machines if you don't have enquires that require speaking with staff with a nice little shop for your last minute snack although they do cost more then what you'd pay elsewhere
Well laid out easy to use station - shame about the trains.
Fantastic staff,  helped us out so much. Well done sharon x
